(2/2) House passage of the Senate bill came only after House Dems were unable to advance their bill which failed to fund many of these important provisions. Thankfully we were able to come together & support a Senate bill that represents the best interests of the American people.

(1/2) Today I supported H.R. 3401, which provides much needed funding for the humanitarian crisis on southern border - it ensures border patrol gets paid + continues funding to combat human trafficking/drug smuggling.

We must work together as a community of family members, neighbors, and friends to help those struggling with PTSD. Today, text a vet or ask one you know how he or she is doing. Through a combined effort, we can work together to help combat PTSD. #PTSDAwareness #BeThere

(2/2) While the Senate bill includes funds to ensure our border security personnel get paid, House Democrats do nothing to address this shortfall. House Dems should stop playing politics and take this bill up immediately. Lives depend on it.
